mapper.select: select d.DORMITORY_ID as dormitoryId, d.DORMITORY_NAME as dormitoryName, d.DORMITORY_PEO_NUM as dormitoryPeoNum, d.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID as dormitoryBuildingId, db.DORMITORY_BUILDING_NAME as dormitoryBuildingName, from EAS_DORMITORY d inner join EAS_DORMITORYBUILDING db on d.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID = db.DORMITORY_BUILDING_ID ${ew.customSqlSegment}
